purpose.p: This part of ISO 10303 specifies an application module for the representation of

p.b: This is a UoF module for AP239

uof.name: Management_Resource_Information_Classification
uof.description: This UoF specifies the definitional information for the classification of the entities defined in .

The '' attribute on the
entity is being classified.
